mutants.original_line: """Sort the list, replace None values with zeros and remove duplicates"""
lst = [0 if i is None else i for i in lst] # replace None with zero
mutants.mutated_line: lst = [0 if i is not None else i for i in lst]

mutants.original_line: lst = [0 if i is None else i for i in lst] # replace None with zero
mutants.mutated_line: lst = [1 if i is None else i for i in lst]

mutants.original_line: lst = [0 if i is None else i for i in lst] # replace None with zero
mutants.mutated_line: lst = [-1 if i is None else i for i in lst]

mutants.original_line: lst = [0 if i is None else i for i in lst] # replace None with zero
mutants.mutated_line: lst = [1 if i is None else i for i in lst]
